titleStmt.title: Act anent the maintenance of the armie for nine moneths, and for retention of one and a half of the anualrent [sic] of eight of the hundred
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: Edinburgh 20. February 1647.
"Act of the Convention of Estates, holden at Edinburgh the fifteeenth of August, 1643. for the loane and taxt [sic]" -- p. 7-20.
Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
